info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 1:50PM EST until January 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light freezing drizzle and very light freezing rain mixed with snow at times producing a light glaze of ice along with snow accumulations less than 1 inch. * WHERE...In Indiana, Grant, Blackford and Jay Counties. In Ohio, Putnam and Allen Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...A glaze of ice mixed with snow at times will make many untreated roads extremely slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Surface weather observations and road reports indicated widespread freezing drizzle and very light freezing rain were causing a light glaze on many roads impacting travel.
info.instruction: If you are travelling this afternoon or evening, exercise extreme caution. Leave extra time to reach your destination and allow plenty of space between your vehicle and the one in front of you. Consider delaying travel if possible.
